org.nlpcraft.model.utils

Interface NCTokenSqlAdapter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of parameters.

    public interface NCTokenSqlAdapter<T>
    Convenient SQL adapter for usage with JDBC prepared statements in methods in NCTokenUtils class.
    See Also:
    NCTokenUtils.prepareNumSql(NCToken, String), NCTokenUtils.prepareDateSql(NCToken, String)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getClause()
      Gets part of SQL syntax with '?' for each parameter.
      List<T> getClauseParameters()
      Gets list parameters corresponding to getClause() statement.
